messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Quizzical Quarry Quest DATE: 11/11/82 The courtroom was a venue of exhaustive questioning as the trial went on. The prosecution summoned the officers pivotal to the investigation to elucidate on their discoveries. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Carter, the head investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Carter. Can you narrate the events on the morning the quest was initiated? WITNESS: Certainly. On the morning of March 3rd, Officer C. D. Davis perceived an unusual activity at the quarry and reported it. The investigation was launched without delay. PROSECUTOR: Who was in charge of the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Foster and Technician G. H. Harris coordinated the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who undertook the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Jackson and K. L. King were responsible for interrogating suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense began a thorough cross-examination of Captain Carter concerning the investigative methods. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Parker, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
